channel.title: The Daily Star – Opinion
channel.description: Latest opinion pieces from The Daily Star

item.title: Foreign or local, Bangladesh cannot afford a port monopoly
item.description: Bangladesh's ports have always been at the centre of our economic life, shaping our ability to trade, compete, and connect with the world. As the global logistics landscape shifts and the Bay of Bengal takes on new geopolitical weight, the governance of our seaports has become a defining national issue.

item.title: COP30 Gender Action Plan: A victory without power?
item.description: As the curtains fell on COP30 in Belém on November 21, negotiators hailed what they insist is a triumph for multilateralism. At least 195 parties approved the Belém package, which includes 29 decisions covering just transition, adaptation finance, trade, gender, and technology.

item.title: The danger of antibiotic resistance must not be ignored anymore
item.description: Latest official data raise serious concerns.
